page.title: 19DAY OF A SCHOOL SECRETARY.
page.content: Mrs Walton is the school secretary at Throckley First School, she gets up at 7 a.m. and has cornflakes and grapefruit for breakfast. She leaves home at 8.15 a.m. She gets to school at 8.25 a.m. and when she gets to school she opens the filing cabinet. She has a coffee break and she has her dinner at school. She likes all of her jobs and she goes home at 4 p.m. Mrs Walton likes bacon for her tea and she likes to watch "Songs of Praise" on television. Her hobbies are local history and craft work and she goes to bed at 11 p.m. She likes being a secretary very much, especially a school secretary because she sees children every day.
